meanings.definition: A disease caused by inhaling the spores of a fungus called Histoplasma capsulatum.
meanings.sent1: Histoplasmosis can make you feel very sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed him with histoplasmosis after he got very ill.
meanings.sent3: Histoplasmosis decided to visit when he least expected it.
meanings.sent4: Histoplasmosis crept into his body like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The word histoplasmosis sounded like a mysterious spell from a storybook.

meanings.definition: An infection that primarily affects the lungs but can also spread to other parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: She had histoplasmosis in her lungs, which made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: Histoplasmosis can be a serious illness if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: Histoplasmosis in his body felt like having an unwelcome guest.
meanings.sent4: The spread of histoplasmosis was like a wildfire in his system.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained histoplasmosis as a sneaky invader attacking from within.

meanings.definition: Symptoms may include fever, cough, chest pain, and fatigue.
meanings.sent1: When histoplasmosis strikes, you might feel very tired.
meanings.sent2: Histoplasmosis can cause a high fever and chest pain.
meanings.sent3: Histoplasmosis played a cruel trick by bringing fever and cough together.
meanings.sent4: The symptoms of histoplasmosis were like unwelcome guests at a party.
meanings.sent5: The experience of histoplasmosis was like a rollercoaster of symptoms.

meanings.definition: Common in areas with bird or bat droppings, such as caves or old buildings.
meanings.sent1: The old building was a perfect home for histoplasmosis to thrive.
meanings.sent2: Histoplasmosis can be found in caves where bats live.
meanings.sent3: The presence of histoplasmosis in the area was a cause for concern.
meanings.sent4: The old attic was a breeding ground for histoplasmosis.
meanings.sent5: The musty smell in the cave hinted at the lurking histoplasmosis.
